text: pasu va maḷavun keren nægiṭuvanu labana dina ohu (allāh) ovunva avamānayaṭa lak karayi. tavada (viśvāsavantayin samaga magē yæyi) num̆balā tarka karamin siṭi evan magē havulkaruvan kohē dæyi vimasayi. niyata vaśayenma ada dina nindāva hā napura dēva pratikṣēpakayin veta yæyi gnānaya denu læbūvan pavasati
